instrucoes.title: How to Participate
instrucoes.info1: â€¢ Sign up daily: Fill in the form correctly with your Twitch username and the name of the Streamer you choose to support.
instrucoes.info2: â€¢ Check if your name is on the participants list after signing up. Note: the winner's name will be taken directly from this list.
instrucoes.info3: â€¢ Enter only one Nickname and one Streamer at a time â€” the prize will be given to a single User and Streamer per draw.
instrucoes.info4: â€¢ Giveaways happen every day at 9:00 PM. The winner is randomly selected.
